role.description: Custom identifier belonging to a topic, provide only if `type` is `extra` or `extra-pattern`
role.title: Role

InputTopicTypes.description:
Input topic types

input (input topic), input_pattern (input pattern topic), extra (extra topic), extra_pattern (extra pattern topic).
Every extra topic must have a role.
InputTopicTypes.title: InputTopicTypes

KafkaApp.description:
Base component for Kafka-based components.
Producer or streaming apps should inherit from this class.

from.description: Topic(s) and/or components from which the component will read input
from.title: From

namespace.description: Namespace in which the component shall be deployed
namespace.title: Namespace

prefix.description: Pipeline prefix that will prefix every component name. If you wish to not have any prefix you can specify an empty string.
prefix.title: Prefix

repoConfig.description: Configuration of the Helm chart repo to be used for deploying the component
repoConfig.title: Repoconfig

type.description:
Base component for Kafka-based components.
Producer or streaming apps should inherit from this class.
type.title: Component type

to.description: Topic(s) into which the component will write output
to.title: To

Error (error topic), output (output topic), and extra topics. Every extra topic must have a role.

StreamsApp.title: StreamsApp

consumerGroup.description: Name of the consumer group used for checking the offset on the topic and processing the related lag.
consumerGroup.title: Consumer group

cooldownPeriod.description: The period to wait after the last trigger reported active before scaling the resource back to 0. https://keda.sh/docs/2.9/concepts/scaling-deployments/#cooldownperiod
cooldownPeriod.title: Cooldown period

idleReplicas.description: If this property is set, KEDA will scale the resource down to this number of replicas. https://keda.sh/docs/2.9/concepts/scaling-deployments/#idlereplicacount
idleReplicas.title: Idle replica count

lagThreshold.description: Average target value to trigger scaling actions.
lagThreshold.title: Lag threshold

maxReplicas.description: This setting is passed to the HPA definition that KEDA will create for a given resource and holds the maximum number of replicas of the target resouce. https://keda.sh/docs/2.9/concepts/scaling-deployments/#maxreplicacount
maxReplicas.title: Max replica count

minReplicas.description: Minimum number of replicas KEDA will scale the resource down to. "https://keda.sh/docs/2.9/concepts/scaling-deployments/#minreplicacount"
minReplicas.title: Min replica count

offsetResetPolicy.description: The offset reset policy for the consumer if the consumer group is not yet subscribed to a partition.
offsetResetPolicy.title: Offset reset policy

pollingInterval.description: This is the interval to check each trigger on. https://keda.sh/docs/2.9/concepts/scaling-deployments/#pollinginterval
pollingInterval.title: Polling interval

topics.description: List of auto-generated Kafka Streams topics used by the streams app.
topics.title: Topics

StreamsAppConfig.description:
StreamsBoostrap app configurations.
The attributes correspond to keys and values that are used as values for the streams bootstrap helm chart. :params streams: Streams Bootstrap streams section
StreamsAppConfig.title: StreamsAppConfig

partitions_count.description: Number of partitions into which the topic is divided
partitions_count.title: Partitions Count

role.description: Custom identifier belonging to one or multiple topics, provide only if `type` is `extra`
role.title: Role
